name: L'unica verità
desc: Shikanoin Heizou's specialty. On the tender, moist scrambled eggs lies a juicy katsu fried to golden perfection, its aroma most enticing indeed... Having been tempted to gobble the dish down, you are somehow seized by the urge to let out all that is hidden in your heart — this is not some sort of secret weapon of Heizou... is it?

value.text: Increases all party members' ATK by 114 for 300s.

customize.name: Ricetta: Tramezzino al tonkatsu
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Katsu Sandwich.

customize.name: Farina
customize.desc: Una polvere ottenuta macinando il frumento. In qualunque modo venga utilizzata, soddisfa il palato di ogni commensale.

customize.name: Pezzo di carne cruda
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Cavolo
customize.desc: A layered, leafy vegetable. Said to have originally been an ornamental plant, it certainly looks great in the pot.

customize.name: Tramezzino al tonkatsu
customize.desc: A nutritionally-balanced meal. The two bread slices clip a thick-cut katsu slab between them. The fragrant, slightly sweet-and-sour sauce is the key to preventing this meal from being too rich. A brilliant mix of outlander style and local flavor!

customize.name: Shikanoin Heizou
customize.desc: Un giovane investigatore prodigio della Commissione Tenryou dai sensi acuti e dalla mente chiara.
